sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_SHOP_BASE_INFO_ID.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SHOP_BASE_INFO (ID,USER_ID,SHOP_ID,NAME,TITLE,DESCRIPTION,SHOP_LOGO,FOOT_LOGO,SELLER_TYPE,GOODS_SOURCE,SHOP_NATURE,SHOP_CATEGORY,CITY,PROVINCE,EXCHANGE_MARGIN,IS_SUPPLIER,OPEN_DATE,APPROVE_STATUS,DOMAIN,SITE_ID,PRODUCT_COUNT,ADDRESS,OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL,OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,IS_ENTER_B2C,CONFIGURATION,GMT_CREATE,GMT_MODIFIED,NICKNAME) VALUES (#id#,#userId#,#shopId#,#name#,#title#,#description#,#shopLogo#,#footLogo#,#sellerType#,#goodsSource#,#shopNature#,#shopCategory#,#city#,#province#,#exchangeMargin#,#isSupplier#,#openDate#,#approveStatus#,#domain#,#siteId#,#productCount#,#address#,#outerShopAddressUrl#,#outerShopLevel#,#outerShopSaleScope#,#isEnterB2c#,#configuration#,SYSDATE,#gmtModified#,#nickname#)

SELECT SEQ_SHOP_CUSTOMER_INFO_ID.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SHOP_CUSTOMER_INFO (ID,SHOP_ID,BUSINESS_LICENSE,ORGANIZATION_CODE,USER_ID,TAX_PASS) VALUES (#id#,#shopId#,#businessLicense#,#organizationCode#,#userId#,#taxPass#)

SELECT SEQ_SHOP_BASE_INFO_ID.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SHOP_BASE_INFO (ID,USER_ID,SHOP_ID,NAME,TITLE,DESCRIPTION,SHOP_LOGO,FOOT_LOGO,SELLER_TYPE,GOODS_SOURCE,SHOP_NATURE,SHOP_CATEGORY,CITY,PROVINCE,EXCHANGE_MARGIN,IS_SUPPLIER,OPEN_DATE,APPROVE_STATUS,DOMAIN,SITE_ID,PRODUCT_COUNT,ADDRESS,OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL,OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,IS_ENTER_B2C,CONFIGURATION,GMT_CREATE,GMT_MODIFIED,NICKNAME) VALUES (#id#,#userId#,#shopId#,#name#,#title#,#description#,#shopLogo#,#footLogo#,#sellerType#,#goodsSource#,#shopNature#,#shopCategory#,#city#,#province#,#exchangeMargin#,#isSupplier#,#openDate#,#approveStatus#,#domain#,#siteId#,#productCount#,#address#,#outerShopAddressUrl#,#outerShopLevel#,#outerShopSaleScope#,#isEnterB2c#,#configuration#,SYSDATE,#gmtModified#,#nickname#)

SELECT SEQ_SHOP_BUSINESS_INFO_ID.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SHOP_BUSINESS_INFO (ID,USER_ID,SHOP_ID,BUSINESS_LICENSE,ORGANIZATION_CODE,BRAND_CERTIFICATE,QUALITY_CERTIFICATE,HYGIENE_LICENSE,PRODUCTION_LICENSE,BUSINESS_CERTIFICATE,BUSINESS,CONTACT_NAME,CONTACT_PHONE,CONTACT_ADDRESS,CONTACT_POSTAL_CODE,ENTERPRISE_NAME,BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER,ORGANIZATION_CODE_NUMBER,BUSINESS_LICENSE_END_DATE,LEGAL_NAME,REGIST_ADDRESS,SHOP_MANAGER_NAME,SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE,SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE,SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL,SHOP_MANAGER_FAX,EMERGENCY_CONTACT_PHONE,EMERGENCY_CONTACT_NAME,TRADEMARK_NUMBER,BRAND_NAME,BRAND_ENGLISH_NAME,BRAND_LOGO,BRAND_STORY,SELLER_NATURE,TAX_PASS,QQ,MSN) VALUES (#id#,#userId#,#shopId#,#businessLicense#,#organizationCode#,#brandCertificate#,#qualityCertificate#,#hygieneLicense#,#productionLicense#,#businessCertificate#,#business#,#contactName#,#contactPhone#,#contactAddress#,#contactPostalCode#,#enterpriseName#,#businessLicenseNumber#,#organizationCodeNumber#,#businessLicenseEndDate#,#legalName#,#registAddress#,#shopManagerName#,#shopManagerTelephone#,#shopManagerMobile#,#shopManagerEmail#,#shopManagerFax#,#emergencyContactPhone#,#emergencyContactName#,#trademarkNumber#,#brandName#,#brandEnglishName#,#brandLogo#,#brandStory#,#sellerNature#,#taxPass#,#qq#,#msn#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE SHOP_ISHOP_INFO SET ID = ID
SHOP_ID = #shopId#
SHOP_MANAGER_NAME = #shopManagerName#
SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE = #shopManagerTelephone#
SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE = #shopManagerMobile#
SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL = #shopManagerEmail#
SHOP_MANAGER_FAX = #shopManagerFax#
QQ = #qq#
MSN = #msn#
CONTACT_ADDRESS = #contactAddress#
ID_CARD = #idCard#
CREATION1 = #creation1#
CREATION2 = #creation2#
WHERE user_id = #userId#

UPDATE SHOP_CUSTOMER_INFO SET ID = ID
SHOP_ID = #shopId#
BUSINESS_LICENSE = #businessLicense#
ORGANIZATION_CODE = #organizationCode#
TAX_PASS = #taxPass#
ENTERPRISE_NAME = #enterpriseName#
BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER = #businessLicenseNumber#
ORGANIZATION_CODE_NUMBER = #organizationCodeNumber#
BUSINESS = #business#
BUSINESS_LICENSE_END_DATE = #businessLicenseEndDate#
LEGAL_NAME = #legalName#
REGIST_ADDRESS = #registAddress#
SHOP_MANAGER_NAME = #shopManagerName#
SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE = #shopManagerTelephone#
SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE = #shopManagerMobile#
SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL = #shopManagerEmail#
SHOP_MANAGER_FAX = #shopManagerFax#
QQ = #qq#
MSN = #msn#
CONTACT_ADDRESS = #contactAddress#
WHERE user_id = #userId#

UPDATE SHOP_BASE_INFO
USER_ID = #userId#
SHOP_ID = #shopId#
NAME = #name#
TITLE = #title#
DESCRIPTION = #description#
SHOP_LOGO = #shopLogo#
FOOT_LOGO = #footLogo#
SELLER_TYPE = #sellerType#
GOODS_SOURCE = #goodsSource#
SHOP_NATURE = #shopNature#
SHOP_CATEGORY = #shopCategory#
CITY = #city#
PROVINCE = #province#
EXCHANGE_MARGIN = #exchangeMargin#
IS_SUPPLIER = #isSupplier#
OPEN_DATE = #openDate#
APPROVE_STATUS = #approveStatus#
DOMAIN = #domain#
SITE_ID = #siteId#
PRODUCT_COUNT = #productCount#
ADDRESS = #address#
CONFIGURATION = #configuration#
GMT_CREATE = #gmtCreate#
GMT_MODIFIED = #gmtModified#
NICKNAME = #nickname#
,OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL = #outerShopAddressUrl#,OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL = #outerShopLevel#,IS_ENTER_B2C = #isEnterB2c#,OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE = #outerShopSaleScope# WHERE user_id = #userId#

UPDATE SHOP_BUSINESS_INFO SET ID = ID
SHOP_ID = #shopId#
BUSINESS_LICENSE = #businessLicense#
ORGANIZATION_CODE = #organizationCode#
BRAND_CERTIFICATE = #brandCertificate#
QUALITY_CERTIFICATE = #qualityCertificate#
HYGIENE_LICENSE = #hygieneLicense#
PRODUCTION_LICENSE = #productionLicense#
BUSINESS_CERTIFICATE = #businessCertificate#
BUSINESS = #business#
CONTACT_NAME = #contactName#
CONTACT_PHONE = #contactPhone#
CONTACT_ADDRESS = #contactAddress#
CONTACT_POSTAL_CODE = #contactPostalCode#
ENTERPRISE_NAME = #enterpriseName#
BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER = #businessLicenseNumber#
ORGANIZATION_CODE_NUMBER = #organizationCodeNumber#
BUSINESS_LICENSE_END_DATE = #businessLicenseEndDate#
LEGAL_NAME = #legalName#
REGIST_ADDRESS = #registAddress#
SHOP_MANAGER_NAME = #shopManagerName#
SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE = #shopManagerTelephone#
SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE = #shopManagerMobile#
SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL = #shopManagerEmail#
SHOP_MANAGER_FAX = #shopManagerFax#
EMERGENCY_CONTACT_PHONE = #emergencyContactPhone#
EMERGENCY_CONTACT_NAME = #emergencyContactName#
TRADEMARK_NUMBER = #trademarkNumber#
BRAND_NAME = #brandName#
BRAND_ENGLISH_NAME = #brandEnglishName#
BRAND_LOGO = #brandLogo#
BRAND_STORY = #brandStory#
SELLER_NATURE = #sellerNature#
TAX_PASS = #taxPass#
QQ = #qq#
MSN = #msn#
WHERE user_id = #userId#

UPDATE SHOP_BASE_INFO SET ID = ID
USER_ID = #userId#
SHOP_ID = #shopId#
NAME = #name#
TITLE = #title#
DESCRIPTION = #description#
SHOP_LOGO = #shopLogo#
FOOT_LOGO = #footLogo#
SELLER_TYPE = #sellerType#
GOODS_SOURCE = #goodsSource#
SHOP_NATURE = #shopNature#
SHOP_CATEGORY = #shopCategory#
CITY = #city#
PROVINCE = #province#
EXCHANGE_MARGIN = #exchangeMargin#
IS_SUPPLIER = #isSupplier#
OPEN_DATE = #openDate#
APPROVE_STATUS = #approveStatus#
DOMAIN = #domain#
SITE_ID = #siteId#
PRODUCT_COUNT = #productCount#
ADDRESS = #address#
CONFIGURATION = #configuration#
GMT_CREATE = #gmtCreate#
GMT_MODIFIED = #gmtModified#
NICKNAME = #nickname#
,OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL = #outerShopAddressUrl#,OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL = #outerShopLevel#,IS_ENTER_B2C = #isEnterB2c#,OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE = #outerShopSaleScope# WHERE user_id = #userId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.SHOP_ID,a.NAME,a.TITLE,a.DESCRIPTION,a.SHOP_LOGO,a.SHOP_CATEGORY, a.SELLER_TYPE,a.OPEN_DATE,a.APPROVE_STATUS,a.DOMAIN,a.SITE_ID,a.PRODUCT_COUNT,a.GOODS_SOURCE,a.CONFIGURATION, a.GMT_CREATE,a.GMT_MODIFIED,a.FOOT_LOGO,a.SHOP_NATURE,a.EXCHANGE_MARGIN,a.OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,a.OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL, a.OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,a.IS_ENTER_B2C,b.SHOP_MANAGER_NAME,b.SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE,b.SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE,b.SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL, b.SHOP_MANAGER_FAX,b.ID_CARD,b.CREATION1,b.CREATION2,b.CONTACT_ADDRESS,b.QQ,B.MSN FROM SHOP_BASE_INFO a
inner join shop_ishop_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.user_id = #userId#

SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.SHOP_ID,a.NAME,a.TITLE,a.DESCRIPTION,a.SHOP_LOGO, a.FOOT_LOGO,a.SELLER_TYPE,a.GOODS_SOURCE,a.SHOP_NATURE,a.SHOP_CATEGORY,a.CITY,a.PROVINCE,a.EXCHANGE_MARGIN,a.IS_SUPPLIER, a.OPEN_DATE,a.APPROVE_STATUS,a.DOMAIN,a.SITE_ID,a.PRODUCT_COUNT,a.ADDRESS,a.OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,a.OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL, a.OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,a.IS_ENTER_B2C,a.CONFIGURATION,a.GMT_CREATE,a.GMT_MODIFIED,a.NICKNAME,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE,b.TAX_PASS,b.ENTERPRISE_NAME, b.BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE_NUMBER,b.BUSINESS,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE_END_DATE, b.LEGAL_NAME,b.REGIST_ADDRESS,b.SHOP_MANAGER_NAME,b.SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE,b.SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE, b.SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL,b.SHOP_MANAGER_FAX,b.QQ,b.MSN,b.CONTACT_ADDRESS FROM SHOP_BASE_INFO a
inner join shop_customer_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.user_id = #userId#

SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.SHOP_ID,a.NAME,a.TITLE,a.DESCRIPTION,a.SHOP_LOGO, a.FOOT_LOGO,a.SELLER_TYPE,a.GOODS_SOURCE,a.SHOP_NATURE,a.SHOP_CATEGORY,a.CITY,a.PROVINCE,a.EXCHANGE_MARGIN,a.IS_SUPPLIER, a.OPEN_DATE,a.APPROVE_STATUS,a.DOMAIN,a.SITE_ID,a.PRODUCT_COUNT,a.ADDRESS,a.OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,a.OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL, a.OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,a.IS_ENTER_B2C,a.CONFIGURATION,a.GMT_CREATE,a.GMT_MODIFIED,a.NICKNAME, b.BUSINESS_LICENSE,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE, b.BRAND_CERTIFICATE,b.QUALITY_CERTIFICATE,b.HYGIENE_LICENSE,b.PRODUCTION_LICENSE,b.BUSINESS_CERTIFICATE,b.BUSINESS,b.CONTACT_NAME,b. CONTACT_PHONE,b.CONTACT_ADDRESS,b.CONTACT_POSTAL_CODE,b.ENTERPRISE_NAME,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE_NUMBER,b. BUSINESS_LICENSE_END_DATE,b.LEGAL_NAME,b.REGIST_ADDRESS,b.SHOP_MANAGER_NAME,b.SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE,b.SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE,b. SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL,b.SHOP_MANAGER_FAX,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_PHONE,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_NAME,b.TRADEMARK_NUMBER,b.BRAND_NAME,b. BRAND_ENGLISH_NAME,b.BRAND_LOGO,b.BRAND_STORY,b.SELLER_NATURE,b.TAX_PASS,b.QQ,b.MSN FROM SHOP_BASE_INFO a
inner join shop_business_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.user_id = #userId#

SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.SHOP_ID,a.NAME,a.TITLE,a.DESCRIPTION,a.SHOP_LOGO, a.FOOT_LOGO,a.SELLER_TYPE,a.GOODS_SOURCE,a.SHOP_NATURE,a.SHOP_CATEGORY,a.CITY,a.PROVINCE,a.EXCHANGE_MARGIN,a.IS_SUPPLIER, a.OPEN_DATE,a.APPROVE_STATUS,a.DOMAIN,a.SITE_ID,a.PRODUCT_COUNT,a.ADDRESS,a.OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,a.OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL, a.OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,a.IS_ENTER_B2C,a.CONFIGURATION,a.GMT_CREATE,a.GMT_MODIFIED,a.NICKNAME,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE,b.TAX_PASS FROM SHOP_BASE_INFO a
inner join shop_customer_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.USER_ID IN
#value[]#

SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.SHOP_ID,a.NAME,a.TITLE,a.DESCRIPTION,a.SHOP_LOGO, a.FOOT_LOGO,a.SELLER_TYPE,a.GOODS_SOURCE,a.SHOP_NATURE,a.SHOP_CATEGORY,a.CITY,a.PROVINCE,a.EXCHANGE_MARGIN,a.IS_SUPPLIER, a.OPEN_DATE,a.APPROVE_STATUS,a.DOMAIN,a.SITE_ID,a.PRODUCT_COUNT,a.ADDRESS,a.OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,a.OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL, a.OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,a.IS_ENTER_B2C,a.CONFIGURATION,a.GMT_CREATE,a.GMT_MODIFIED,a.NICKNAME, b.BUSINESS_LICENSE,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE, b.BRAND_CERTIFICATE,b.QUALITY_CERTIFICATE,b.HYGIENE_LICENSE,b.PRODUCTION_LICENSE,b.BUSINESS_CERTIFICATE,b.BUSINESS,b.CONTACT_NAME,b. CONTACT_PHONE,b.CONTACT_ADDRESS,b.CONTACT_POSTAL_CODE,b.ENTERPRISE_NAME,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE_NUMBER,b. BUSINESS_LICENSE_END_DATE,b.LEGAL_NAME,b.REGIST_ADDRESS,b.SHOP_MANAGER_NAME,b.SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE,b.SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE,b. SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL,b.SHOP_MANAGER_FAX,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_PHONE,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_NAME,b.TRADEMARK_NUMBER,b.BRAND_NAME,b. BRAND_ENGLISH_NAME,b.BRAND_LOGO,b.BRAND_STORY,b.SELLER_NATURE,b.TAX_PASS,b.QQ,b.MSN FROM SHOP_BASE_INFO a
inner join shop_business_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.USER_ID IN
#value[]#

SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.SHOP_ID,a.NAME,a.TITLE,a.DESCRIPTION,a.SHOP_LOGO, a.FOOT_LOGO,a.SELLER_TYPE,a.GOODS_SOURCE,a.SHOP_NATURE,a.SHOP_CATEGORY,a.CITY,a.PROVINCE,a.EXCHANGE_MARGIN,a.IS_SUPPLIER, a.OPEN_DATE,a.APPROVE_STATUS,a.DOMAIN,a.SITE_ID,a.PRODUCT_COUNT,a.ADDRESS,a.OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,a.OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL, a.OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,a.IS_ENTER_B2C,a.CONFIGURATION,a.GMT_CREATE,a.GMT_MODIFIED, a.NICKNAME,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE, b.BRAND_CERTIFICATE,b.QUALITY_CERTIFICATE,b.HYGIENE_LICENSE,b.PRODUCTION_LICENSE,b.BUSINESS_CERTIFICATE,b.BUSINESS,b.CONTACT_NAME,b. CONTACT_PHONE,b.CONTACT_ADDRESS,b.CONTACT_POSTAL_CODE,b.ENTERPRISE_NAME,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE_NUMBER,b. BUSINESS_LICENSE_END_DATE,b.LEGAL_NAME,b.REGIST_ADDRESS,b.SHOP_MANAGER_NAME,b.SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE,b.SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE,b. SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL,b.SHOP_MANAGER_FAX,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_PHONE,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_NAME,b.TRADEMARK_NUMBER,b.BRAND_NAME,b. BRAND_ENGLISH_NAME,b.BRAND_LOGO,b.BRAND_STORY,b.SELLER_NATURE,b.TAX_PASS,b.QQ,b.MSN FROM SHOP_BASE_INFO a
inner join shop_business_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.shop_id = #shopId#

SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.SHOP_ID,a.NAME,a.TITLE,a.DESCRIPTION,a.SHOP_LOGO, a.FOOT_LOGO,a.SELLER_TYPE,a.GOODS_SOURCE,a.SHOP_NATURE,a.SHOP_CATEGORY,a.CITY,a.PROVINCE,a.EXCHANGE_MARGIN,a.IS_SUPPLIER, a.OPEN_DATE,a.APPROVE_STATUS,a.DOMAIN,a.SITE_ID,a.PRODUCT_COUNT,a.ADDRESS,a.OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,a.OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL, a.OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,a.IS_ENTER_B2C,a.CONFIGURATION,a.GMT_CREATE,a.GMT_MODIFIED,a.NICKNAME,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE,b.TAX_PASS FROM SHOP_BASE_INFO a
inner join shop_customer_info b on a.shop_id = b.shop_id where a.APPROVE_STATUS = 1 and a.shop_id is not null

SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.SHOP_ID,a.NAME,a.TITLE,a.DESCRIPTION,a.SHOP_LOGO, a.FOOT_LOGO,a.SELLER_TYPE,a.GOODS_SOURCE,a.SHOP_NATURE,a.SHOP_CATEGORY,a.CITY,a.PROVINCE,a.EXCHANGE_MARGIN,a.IS_SUPPLIER, a.OPEN_DATE,a.APPROVE_STATUS,a.DOMAIN,a.SITE_ID,a.PRODUCT_COUNT,a.ADDRESS,a.OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,a.OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL, a.OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,a.IS_ENTER_B2C,a.CONFIGURATION,a.GMT_CREATE,a.GMT_MODIFIED,a.NICKNAME, b.BUSINESS_LICENSE,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE, b.BRAND_CERTIFICATE,b.QUALITY_CERTIFICATE,b.HYGIENE_LICENSE,b.PRODUCTION_LICENSE,b.BUSINESS_CERTIFICATE,b.BUSINESS,b.CONTACT_NAME,b. CONTACT_PHONE,b.CONTACT_ADDRESS,b.CONTACT_POSTAL_CODE,b.ENTERPRISE_NAME,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE_NUMBER,b. BUSINESS_LICENSE_END_DATE,b.LEGAL_NAME,b.REGIST_ADDRESS,b.SHOP_MANAGER_NAME,b.SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE,b.SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE,b. SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL,b.SHOP_MANAGER_FAX,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_PHONE,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_NAME,b.TRADEMARK_NUMBER,b.BRAND_NAME,b. BRAND_ENGLISH_NAME,b.BRAND_LOGO,b.BRAND_STORY,b.SELLER_NATURE,b.TAX_PASS,b.QQ,b.MSN FROM SHOP_BASE_INFO a
inner join shop_business_info b on a.shop_id = b.shop_id where a.APPROVE_STATUS = 1 and a.shop_id is not null
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SHOP_BASE_INFO SET IS_SUPPLIER = #isSupplier# WHERE shop_id = #shopId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS R, T1.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.SHOP_ID,a.NAME,a.TITLE,a.DESCRIPTION,a.SHOP_LOGO, a.FOOT_LOGO,a.SELLER_TYPE,a.GOODS_SOURCE,a.SHOP_NATURE,a.SHOP_CATEGORY,a.CITY,a.PROVINCE,a.EXCHANGE_MARGIN,a.IS_SUPPLIER, a.OPEN_DATE,a.APPROVE_STATUS,a.DOMAIN,a.SITE_ID,a.PRODUCT_COUNT,a.ADDRESS,a.OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,a.OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL, a.OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,a.IS_ENTER_B2C,a.CONFIGURATION,a.GMT_CREATE,a.GMT_MODIFIED,a.NICKNAME, b.BUSINESS_LICENSE,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE, b.BRAND_CERTIFICATE,b.QUALITY_CERTIFICATE,b.HYGIENE_LICENSE,b.PRODUCTION_LICENSE,b.BUSINESS_CERTIFICATE,b.BUSINESS,b.CONTACT_NAME,b. CONTACT_PHONE,b.CONTACT_ADDRESS,b.CONTACT_POSTAL_CODE,b.ENTERPRISE_NAME,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE_NUMBER,b. BUSINESS_LICENSE_END_DATE,b.LEGAL_NAME,b.REGIST_ADDRESS,b.SHOP_MANAGER_NAME,b.SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE,b.SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE,b. SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL,b.SHOP_MANAGER_FAX,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_PHONE,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_NAME,b.TRADEMARK_NUMBER,b.BRAND_NAME,b. BRAND_ENGLISH_NAME,b.BRAND_LOGO,b.BRAND_STORY,b.SELLER_NATURE,b.TAX_PASS,b.QQ,b.MSN FROM SHOP_BASE_INFO a inner join shop_business_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE IS_SUPPLIER = 1) A
SHOP_ID IN
#shopIdList[]#
PROVINCE = #province#
EXCHANGE_MARGIN = #exchangeType#
order by name ) T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow#) T2 WHERE T2.R >= #startRow#

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS R, T1.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.SHOP_ID,a.NAME,a.TITLE,a.DESCRIPTION,a.SHOP_LOGO, a.FOOT_LOGO,a.SELLER_TYPE,a.GOODS_SOURCE,a.SHOP_NATURE,a.SHOP_CATEGORY,a.CITY,a.PROVINCE,a.EXCHANGE_MARGIN,a.IS_SUPPLIER, a.OPEN_DATE,a.APPROVE_STATUS,a.DOMAIN,a.SITE_ID,a.PRODUCT_COUNT,a.ADDRESS,a.OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,a.OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL, a.OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,a.IS_ENTER_B2C,a.CONFIGURATION,a.GMT_CREATE,a.GMT_MODIFIED,a.NICKNAME, b.BUSINESS_LICENSE,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE, b.BRAND_CERTIFICATE,b.QUALITY_CERTIFICATE,b.HYGIENE_LICENSE,b.PRODUCTION_LICENSE,b.BUSINESS_CERTIFICATE,b.BUSINESS,b.CONTACT_NAME,b. CONTACT_PHONE,b.CONTACT_ADDRESS,b.CONTACT_POSTAL_CODE,b.ENTERPRISE_NAME,b.BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER,b.ORGANIZATION_CODE_NUMBER,b. BUSINESS_LICENSE_END_DATE,b.LEGAL_NAME,b.REGIST_ADDRESS,b.SHOP_MANAGER_NAME,b.SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE,b.SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE,b. SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL,b.SHOP_MANAGER_FAX,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_PHONE,b.EMERGENCY_CONTACT_NAME,b.TRADEMARK_NUMBER,b.BRAND_NAME,b. BRAND_ENGLISH_NAME,b.BRAND_LOGO,b.BRAND_STORY,b.SELLER_NATURE,b.TAX_PASS,b.QQ,b.MSN FROM SHOP_BASE_INFO a inner join shop_business_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE IS_SUPPLIER = 1) A
SHOP_ID IN
#shopIdList[]#
PROVINCE = #province#
EXCHANGE_MARGIN = #exchangeType#
order by name ) T1 ) T2
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_SHOP_BASE_INFO_ID.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SHOP_BASE_INFO (ID,USER_ID,SHOP_ID,NAME,TITLE,DESCRIPTION,SHOP_LOGO,FOOT_LOGO,SELLER_TYPE,GOODS_SOURCE,SHOP_NATURE,SHOP_CATEGORY,CITY,PROVINCE,EXCHANGE_MARGIN,IS_SUPPLIER,OPEN_DATE,APPROVE_STATUS,DOMAIN,SITE_ID,PRODUCT_COUNT,ADDRESS,OUTER_SHOP_ADDRESS_URL,OUTER_SHOP_LEVEL,OUTER_SHOP_SALE_SCOPE,IS_ENTER_B2C,CONFIGURATION,GMT_CREATE,GMT_MODIFIED,NICKNAME) VALUES (#id#,#userId#,#shopId#,#name#,#title#,#description#,#shopLogo#,#footLogo#,#sellerType#,#goodsSource#,#shopNature#,#shopCategory#,#city#,#province#,#exchangeMargin#,#isSupplier#,#openDate#,#approveStatus#,#domain#,#siteId#,#productCount#,#address#,#outerShopAddressUrl#,#outerShopLevel#,#outerShopSaleScope#,#isEnterB2c#,#configuration#,SYSDATE,#gmtModified#,#nickname#)

SELECT SEQ_SHOP_ISHOP_INFO_ID.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SHOP_ISHOP_INFO (ID,USER_ID,SHOP_MANAGER_NAME,SHOP_MANAGER_TELEPHONE,SHOP_MANAGER_MOBILE,SHOP_MANAGER_EMAIL) VALUES (#id#,#userId#,#shopManagerName#,#shopManagerTelephone#,#shopManagerMobile#,#shopManagerEmail#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE SHOP_BASE_INFO
USER_ID = #userId#
SHOP_ID = #shopId#
NAME = #name#
TITLE = #title#
DESCRIPTION = #description#
SHOP_LOGO = #shopLogo#
FOOT_LOGO = #footLogo#
SELLER_TYPE = #sellerType#
GOODS_SOURCE = #goodsSource#
SHOP_NATURE = #shopNature#
SHOP_CATEGORY = #shopCategory#
CITY = #city#
PROVINCE = #province#
EXCHANGE_MARGIN = #exchangeMargin#
IS_SUPPLIER = #isSupplier#
OPEN_DATE = #openDate#
APPROVE_STATUS = #approveStatus#
DOMAIN = #domain#
SITE_ID = #siteId#
PRODUCT_COUNT = #productCount#
ADDRESS = #address#
CONFIGURATION = #configuration#
GMT_CREATE = #gmtCreate#
GMT_MODIFIED = #gmtModified#
NICKNAME = #nickname#
WHERE user_id = #userId#
